mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, authority, enabled, uname, utel, uemail, uaddr) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, "ROLE_USER", "1", #{uname}, #{utel}, #{uemail}, #{uaddr})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, uname = #{uname}, utel = #{utel}, uemail = #{uemail}, uaddr = #{uaddr}, uimg = #{uimg} WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT uname, uposition, udepart, uemail FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
